amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the Legal Services Corporation by $328 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Legal Services Corporation by $328 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott, Austin amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 122 - 289 (Roll no. 219).

action.text: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Scott, Austin.
